Home INFORMATION BUDGET & TAXES PROPERTY TAX By Resolution 2025-06-R, 8/6/2025, the Saint Hedwig City Council proposed an Ad Valorem Tax Rate of $0.495000 per $100 valuation for 2025. RESOLUTION 2025-06-R_Proposed 2025 Ad Valorem Tax Rate Notice of 2025 Calculated Tax Rates THE CITY OF SAINT HEDWIG ADOPTED A TAX RATE THAT WILL RAISE MORE TAXES FOR MAINTENANCE AND OPERTATIONS THAN LAST YEAR'S TAX RATE. THE TAX RATE WILL EFFECTIVELY BE RAISED BY -0.12 PERCENT AND WILL RAISE TAXES FOR MAINTENANCE AND OPERATIONS ON A $100,000 HOME BY APPROXIMATELY $0.00 Ordinance 2024-11_Adopted 2024 Ad Valorem Tax Rate Notice of Public Hearing on Tax Increase Public Hearing Notice (Proposed Budget & Tax Rate) By Resolution 2024-08-R, 8/1/2024, the Saint Hedwig City Council proposed an Ad Valorem Tax Rate of $0.495000 per $100 valuation for 2024 RESOLUTION 2024-08-R_Proposed 2024 Ad Valorem Tax Rate 2024 Tax Rate Notice By Resolution 2023-08-R, 8/3/2023, the Saint Hedwig City Council proposed an Ad Valorem Tax Rate of $0.495000 per $100 valuation for 2023 RESOLUTION 2023-08-R_Proposed 2023 Ad Valorem Tax Rate NOTICE OF MEETING TO VOTE ON 2023 TAX RATE ORDINANCE 2023-17 Adopted 2023 Ad Valorem Tax Rate By Resolution 2216, 8/4/2022, the Saint Hedwig City Council proposed an Ad Valorem Tax Rate of $0.495000 per $100 valuation for 2022 ORDINANCE 2022-23_Adopted 2022 Ad Valorem Tax Rate RESOLUTION 2216_Proposed 2022 Ad Valorem Tax Rate (Tax rates are per $100 of taxable value) TAX YEAR 2024:      0.495000 TAX YEAR 2023:      0.495000 TAX YEAR 2022:      0.495000 TAX YEAR 2021:      0.463578 TAX YEAR 2020:      0.463578 TAX YEAR 2019:      0.430000 TAX YEAR 2018:      0.396690 TAX YEAR 2017:      0.410632 TAX YEAR 2016:      0.424091 TAX YEAR 2015:      0.443633 TAX YEAR 2005 THROUGH 2014:      0.479895 TAX YEAR 2004:      0.435756 TAX YEAR 2003:      0.443942 TAX YEAR 2002:      0.434188 TAX YEAR 2001:      0.381531
